diff.description: Create table for Disease Registry Workflow Patient
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `dr_workflow_patient` ( `dr_workflow_patient_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `dr_workflow_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `patient_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `enrolled_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `tested_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `status` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `created_by` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `updated_by` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `updated_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `retired` bit(1) default NULL, `retired_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `retired_by` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `retired_reason` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dr_workflow_patient_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
